00038 namespace birdseed
00039 {
00040     namespace v1
00041     {
00042         using namespace birdseed::dev;
00043 
00044         // 0 = quiet; 1 = some message; 2 = lots of messages
00045         void setFitSNPGaussiansVerbosity(int verbose);
00046 
00047         // For getting descriptions of parameters that can be controlled via command-line options
00048         PgOpt **getAlgorithmicOpts();
00049 
00050         // For setting parameters from command-line options
00051         void setAlgorithmicParameters(CONSTHACK PgOptions &opts);
00052 
00053         // For getting parameter descriptions for chipstream components.  These are appended to
00054         // opts vector.
00055         void getSelfDocOptions(std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> *opts);
00056 
00057         // For setting parameters from chipstream argument.
00058         void setSelfDocOptions(SelfDoc *doc, CONSTHACK std::map<std::string,std::string> &param);
00059     
00060         // Do the clustering
00061         Clusters FitSNPGaussianPriors3(const IntensityMatrix &intensities, const Priors &priors);
00062 
00063         // Generate the matrix of probabilities of a sample being in a particular cluster (N samples x K clusters)
00064         void calculatePXI_ZJ(PXI_ZJMatrix *pxi_zj,
00065                             const birdseed::dev::Clusters &clusters,
00066                             const IntensityMatrix &intensities, size_t k);
00067 
00068         double calculateSNPSpecificCorrectionFactor(const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00069                                                     const Priors &priors);
00070 
00071         // Amount to weight confidence factor determined by comparing most likely cluster to next most likely,
00072         // as compared to confidence factor determined by distance of sample from cluster mean.
00073         extern double relative_distance_confidence_weight;
00074 
00075         // After calculating clusters, ensure all weights are >= this
00076         extern double final_weight_min;
00077     
00078     
00079         // Calculate confidence factor based on distance of sample from cluster mean
00080         double calculateConfidenceRelativeToCluster(const Matrix2x2 &B,
00081                                                     const IntensityMatrix::ROW &intensities,
00082                                                     const IntensityMatrix::ROW &clusterMean);
00083 
00084         // Generate the B matrix that gets passed to calculateConfidenceRelativeToCluster
00085         Matrix2x2 makeBMatrix(const Matrix2x2::ROW &clusterVars, double covar);
00086     
00087     };
